name: Perspective: The Game
description:
My first ever personal project made with Unity.

In this game, you can switch between two scientists to get to the exit together. And remember, maybe switching perspective is the right thing to do !

It's a free puzzle game  in AZERTY containing 10 levels and testing elements, mainly inspired by Portal, as well as unique mechanics that you've yet to discover during your journey in this laboratory.

If you find any game-breaking bugs, do not hesitate to report them in the comments !
